files.patch:
@@ -123,15 +123,0 @@ - * @apiNote - * - * {@code sa} denotes the {@code byte[]} backing a {@link String}. When - * {@linkplain String#COMPACT_STRINGS compact strings} are disabled, a - * {@code char} is always represented by 2 bytes, i.e., - * encoded in UTF-16. When enabled, if the content is ISO-8859-1, a - * {@code char} is represented by 1 byte; otherwise again by 2 bytes. - *

- * This method assumes that {@code sa} is encoded in UTF-16, and hence, - * each {@code char} maps to 2 bytes. - *

- * {@code da} is encoded in ISO-8859-1. There each {@code byte} corresponds - * to a {@code char}. - *

- *
